title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Wildlife Viewing
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Wildlife Viewing                Wildlife Viewing      The park provides the opportunity to spot some of the unique wildlife found in Hawaii. Along the shore, you can watch for green sea turtles and may be lucky enough to spot one basking in the sun.  Coastal birds may be seen feeding along the rocky coastlines, and you may even glimpse our native bat feeding over the water at sunset.
